title: How museums are shaping the future
itunes:title: How museums are shaping the future
itunes:subtitle: Author, historian and museum director Neil MacGregor talks about his new BBC radio series, The Museums that Make Us
description:
Neil MacGregor talks to Matt Elton about his new BBC Radio 4 series, The Museums that Make Us, and the ways in which museums around the UK are adapting to a changing society – and shaping the future.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
